alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 30 at 4:49PM AKST until December 30 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Near The Ward Lake Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until 930 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 446 PM AKST, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from rain and snowmelt are causing minor flooding. Minor flooding is ongoing, especially near Ward Lake Recreational Area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 inches are possible through Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
